setting.name: The Founders' World (specifically, the planet and city of Zha'thik)
setting.description: The Founders' World is a post-apocalyptic science fantasy setting where ancient civilizations have left behind remnants of their technology and wisdom. The world is characterized by a mix of advanced alien structures, ancient ruins, and mysterious energies. The atmosphere is dark and foreboding, with an undercurrent of tension and danger.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Job Offer
litography_node.description: Bernie announces the new job opportunity to the crew, describing it as "low risk, high reward".

litography_node.name: Eliza's Skepticism
litography_node.description: Eliza scoffs at the idea of the job, expressing her desire for something more exciting ("High risk, Extreme reward!").

litography_node.name: Discovery of the Walled City
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery and Eliza notice a geode-like structure along the walls of their ship, which is revealed to be an enormous cave system.

litography_node.name: Communication Breakthrough
litography_node.description: Eliza uses Jack's Communicator to contact him on the bridge, revealing that she has discovered something significant and prompting Jack to hurry over.

litography_node.name: Exploration of the Walled City
litography_node.description: Eliza turns the ship around to reveal more of the cave system, while Kate looks back to take in the full extent of the discovery.

litography_node.name: The Soldier's Departure
litography_node.description: The Soldier rushes off to inform the crew about their mission priorities, creating tension and momentum in the story.

litography_node.name: The Job Reveal
litography_node.description: Bernie reveals that he got them a new job with low risk and high reward, but Eliza is unimpressed.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Disappointment
litography_node.description: Eliza scoffs at the job, calling it "boring," and expressing her desire for something more exciting (high-risk, extreme-reward).

litography_node.name: Rope Bridge Close Call
litography_node.description: Eliza cuts the rope bridge behind her, causing it to collapse and narrowly allowing her to escape. She smirks at having outsmarted her pursuers.

litography_node.name: Doubt
litography_node.description: ATTENDANT is asked by THE MOUTH about breaching defenses, and hesitates to provide a straightforward answer.

litography_node.name: Eliza Weighs Her Decision
litography_node.description: Eliza is faced with a difficult decision about whether or not to accept Archibald's offer, as her crew is also struggling to keep calm amidst the news.

litography_node.name: The Unexpected Warning
litography_node.description: A man with a ring appears out of the shadows, warning Eliza that they might not make it, adding tension to the scene.

litography_node.name: Job News Revelation
litography_node.description: Jack tells Eliza that Bernie got them a new job, but Eliza interrupts him to reveal that she also got a job.

litography_node.name: Turning Point
litography_node.description: Eliza makes a crucial decision to turn the ship 15 miles to the left, which leads to a change in their surroundings.

litography_node.name: Jack's Revelation
litography_node.description: Jack reveals what he told Grant about their job, which may hold a clue to who killed him.

litography_node.name: Ship Split and Launch
litography_node.description: The two ships suddenly shoot apart, with one temple ship going up and the other falling down. The Petrov's turbines blast to full on and it rockets forward.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Evasion
litography_node.description: Eliza tries to change the topic by suggesting they first hear about Bernie's job offer, revealing her anxiety or memory lapse.

litography_node.name: Crew Leaves the Bar
litography_node.description: Jack uses hand gestures and help from Kate to drag an unsteady Eliza out of the bar towards the ship.

litography_node.name: Revealing the View
litography_node.description: Eliza raises the ship to reveal walls that are like those of a geode, covered in red garnets, surprising everyone on board.

litography_node.name: Jack's Communicator Activation
litography_node.description: Eliza fumbles to turn on Jack's communicator, indicating urgency or excitement about sharing this discovery.

litography_node.name: Observing the Geode
litography_node.description: Eliza turns the ship around to observe more of the geode and its vast interior filled with garnets, further detailing the discovery.

litography_node.name: Soldier's Obedience
litography_node.description: The Soldier carries out an order from THE MOUTH to inform the crew about prioritizing their current mission over honoring fallen comrades.

litography_node.name: Eliza Denies Drinking
litography_node.description: Eliza tries to remember what Jack said, revealing she was likely intoxicated at the time of their conversation.

litography_node.name: Bernie Presents His Job Offer
litography_node.description: Bernie introduces the job as low risk and high reward, which catches Eliza's interest with her own proposal of a high-risk, extreme-reward opportunity.

litography_node.name: Eliza Discovers Her Own Job Opportunity
litography_node.description: Eliza reveals her own job proposal, which is more exciting than Bernie's offer, leading to an internal conflict among the crew members.

litography_node.name: Eliza Fleeing Through Market Square
litography_node.description: Eliza runs through a market square, holding a satchel close to her chest. Three guards follow her, cursing after her. The town is set on large cliffs with rusted and barely held together buildings. She eventually runs across a rope bridge to another butte and cuts it, causing the guards to narrowly escape the collapsing bridge. She smirks.

litography_node.name: Approach of Braggart's Cave
litography_node.description: A Petrov approaches an enormous cliff covered in vegetation and heads towards a waterfall. Entering the waterfall reveals Braggart's cave, setting up the next scene.

litography_node.name: Man in Shadows Questions Archibald
litography_node.description: The man in shadows inquires about the crew’s survival prospects with a Ring, showing he is aware of or invested in their success or failure.

litography_node.name: Approaching Braggart's Cave
litography_node.description: The Petrov approaches an enormous cliff covered in vegetation and a waterfall to reveal Braggart's cave. The cave is large enough to house several airships with buildings perched precariously on the walls or carved into the cliff face, containing multiple ships connected by chains.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Excitement
litography_node.description: Upon hearing of his potential job, Bernie becomes enthusiastic about it being a low risk, high reward opportunity.

litography_node.name: Silence After Interruption
litography_node.description: The group falls silent after Kate's interruption, indicating a temporary resolution of conflict but also setting up an awkward atmosphere.

litography_node.name: Mileage Check
litography_node.description: Bernie notes that they have traveled 15 miles without any changes in their surroundings, indicating a lack of progress or movement forward.

litography_node.name: Light Disappearance
litography_node.description: The ship's lights suddenly stop casting on the surrounding area, signaling a significant change in the environment and potentially heightening tension or curiosity.

litography_node.name: Ship Stopping
litography_node.description: Eliza stops the ship abruptly, reacting to the disappearance of light, which could signify a decision made based on new information or perceived danger.

litography_node.name: Ship's Destruction
litography_node.description: The ship careens out of control and crashes into the center "post" of the geode, causing it to erupt into a fireball and shatter.

litography_node.name: Escape Attempt
litography_node.description: Eliza rushes towards the discovered exit with the crew following closely while dodging more falling debris.

litography_node.name: Eliza’s Concern About Potential Danger
litography_node.description: Eliza notes something seems "off" about the city, indicating a potential danger or hidden issue that needs to be addressed.

litography_node.name: Archibald's Justification for Success
litography_node.description: Archibald justifies the necessity of their success by mentioning the lost time and money on the project that could change history.

litography_node.name: Ships Separate
litography_node.description: The two ships suddenly shoot apart. The temple ship goes up while the Petrov falls down. The Petrov's turbines activate fully, propelling it forward. Eliza corrects the ship's orientation to level again.

litography_node.name: The Crew Departs
litography_node.description: Jack helps Eliza up and they drag her out of the bar with Kate's assistance, marking their departure from the scene.

litography_node.name: Reaction to the Walled City
litography_node.description: The crew members (Kate, Bernie) react with amazement and wonder, using exclamatory phrases ("By the Founders!", "Holy...") to express their awe at the natural phenomenon.

litography_node.name: Naming the Discovery
litography_node.description: Bernie guesses that the geode-like structure is called Garnet Caves, and Eliza agrees with a dazed expression, still trying to process the magnitude of their discovery.

litography_node.name: Jack's Entrance
litography_node.description: Jack enters the cabin, casting a light on Eliza, which creates an intimate atmosphere and sets up their interaction.

litography_node.name: Jack's Offer of Comfort
litography_node.description: Jack offers to close the door and provides emotional support to Eliza, showing his concern for her well-being.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Disclosure
litography_node.description: Eliza confides in Jack about the cave, revealing a deeper emotional struggle that has been building throughout the story.

litography_node.name: Shared Understanding
litography_node.description: Jack and Eliza share a moment of understanding, with Jack acknowledging her struggles and providing a sense of solidarity.

litography_node.name: First Glimpse of the City
litography_node.description: Eliza and Kate approach the large white wall with the citadel inside, and Kate's jaw drops in awe at the structure's beauty and scale.

litography_node.name: Preparations for Invasion
litography_node.description: Eliza turns on her communicator to call Jack and asks him to bring Dr. Montgomery to the bridge, indicating preparations are underway.

litography_node.name: Suspicion
litography_node.description: Eliza expresses unease about something being "off" as they observe the city, foreshadowing potential danger or complications.

litography_node.name: Discover Crashed Ships
litography_node.description: Eliza discovers the clearing and sees the crashed ships with their skeletons, which sparks concern.

history.name: Founding of a new world or society
history.description: The text mentions that "Long ago, the Founders fell from the heavens" and that Branson is joined by other brass figurines, including Henderson, Crawford, Vandenberg, and Asimov, who are part of a clan. This suggests that there was a founding event or creation myth for this world or society.

history.name: The Insignia of Clan Asimov's decline
history.description: The text mentions that "all of clan Asimov was either dead, or assimilated" and that the Insignia for clan Asimov slowly retracts into the machine. This suggests a decline or fall of clan Asimov.

history.name: Exploration and discovery of a new planet
history.description: The text describes a spacefaring vessel entering orbit of a suitable planet, detecting an incoming threat, and initiating an emergency landing. While not historically specific, this event seems to be part of the story's backstory or exploration of a new world.

history.name: The sinking of the Petrov
history.description: The text describes Eliza attempting to dock with the Temple ship while being pursued by another vessel, resulting in the Petrov taking damage and eventually sinking. This event seems to be part of the story's narrative.

faction.name: The Petrov
faction.description: A group of explorers, adventurers, or treasure hunters.
faction.goals: To explore, discover, and collect valuable resources.
faction.faction_values: Self-reliance, resourcefulness, and a willingness to take risks.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not specified, but likely from selling their discoveries, salvaging materials, and possibly trading with other organizations.
faction.faction_expenses: Equipment maintenance, supplies, and potential costs associated with navigating and exploring the caverns.

faction.name: Clan Asimov
faction.description: A faction of individuals who seek to uncover ancient knowledge and power.
faction.goals: To gain access to powerful technology and understand the secrets of the past.
faction.faction_values: Intellectual curiosity, ambition, and a desire for power.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not specified, but likely from selling or trading valuable resources, such as the codex.
faction.faction_expenses: Possibly costs associated with acquiring and maintaining advanced technology.

faction.name: The Founders
faction.description: A group of powerful individuals who created the Founder City and its technology.
faction.goals: To preserve knowledge, wisdom, and power for future generations.
faction.faction_values: Wisdom, compassion, and a commitment to the greater good.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not specified, but likely from controlling access to valuable resources and knowledge.
faction.faction_expenses: Possibly costs associated with maintaining the city's infrastructure and protecting its secrets.

faction.name: BalmClear
faction.description: A company or organization that produces and sells a product called BalmClear.
faction.goals: To increase sales and revenue by marketing and distributing their products effectively.
faction.faction_values: Profitability, efficiency, and customer satisfaction.
faction.faction_income_sources: Revenue from sales of BalmClear products.
faction.faction_expenses: Costs associated with production, advertising, and distribution.

faction.name: Archibald's Group
faction.description: A mysterious organization that seeks to acquire powerful technology and knowledge.
faction.goals: To gain access to advanced technology and understand the secrets of the past.
faction.faction_values: Ambition, resourcefulness, and a willingness to take risks.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not specified, but likely from acquiring and selling valuable resources, such as the codex.
faction.faction_expenses: Possibly costs associated with acquiring and maintaining advanced technology.

faction.name: Jimmy's Group
faction.description: A mysterious organization that seems to be working with Archibald, possibly as a spy or informant.
faction.goals: To gather information and influence events from behind the scenes.
faction.faction_values: Loyalty, discretion, and a commitment to their employer's goals.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not specified, but likely from receiving payments or benefits for their services.
faction.faction_expenses: Possibly costs associated with maintaining cover and gathering intelligence.

faction.name: The Asimov Clan
faction.description: A clan within a larger social structure that was involved in secretive heretical activities.
faction.goals: To maintain or spread their beliefs and values, possibly at the expense of others.
faction.faction_values: Secrecy, potentially conflicting with the values of the Founders.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not explicitly stated, but implied to have resources for secretive activities and potential conflicts.
faction.faction_expenses: Not detailed in the text.

faction.name: The Branson Clan
faction.description: A clan that played a significant role in the conflict against the Asimov Clan.
faction.goals: To uphold the values and rules set by the Founders and to protect their own clan from heresy.
faction.faction_values: Loyalty, justice, and adherence to the teachings of the Founders.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not explicitly stated, but implied to have resources for military actions.
faction.faction_expenses: Military operations against other clans.

faction.name: Jimmy (as a representative of a shadowy organization)
faction.description: An individual who appears to be involved in a clandestine operation or project with Archibald.
faction.goals: To ensure the success of the project and maintain secrecy about its nature.
faction.faction_values: Ambition, pragmatism, and possibly loyalty to an undisclosed higher authority.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not explicitly stated but implied through his authority over resources and personnel.
faction.faction_expenses: Resources for the project, possibly including bribery or blackmail.

faction.name: Archibald's Organization
faction.description: A group or individual with significant financial power, seeking a valuable artifact (the Codex).
faction.goals: To acquire the Codex for an unknown purpose, likely involving financial gain or historical significance.
faction.faction_values: Ambition and materialism.
faction.faction_income_sources: Financial wealth, possibly through trade, investments, or other lucrative ventures.
faction.faction_expenses: Not detailed in the text but implied to involve significant resources.

faction.name: The Market (within the larger social structure)
faction.description: A marketplace within a cavern where goods are traded.
faction.goals: To facilitate commerce and economic activities among various groups.
faction.faction_values: Trade and profit.
faction.faction_income_sources: Profits from the sale of goods and services.
faction.faction_expenses: Operational costs, possibly including tax or fees levied by higher authorities.

litography_node.name: Jack Wakes Eliza
litography_node.description: Jack shakes Eliza awake on a table, causing her to wake up and start arguing with him.

litography_node.name: Eliza Reveals Her Job
litography_node.description: Eliza reveals that she got them a job, surprising Jack, who is taken aback by her enthusiasm.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Job Offer
litography_node.description: Bernie announces the new job opportunity to the crew, describing it as "low risk, high reward".

litography_node.name: Eliza's Skepticism
litography_node.description: Eliza scoffs at the idea of the job, expressing her desire for something more exciting ("High risk, Extreme reward!").

litography_node.name: The Crew Departs
litography_node.description: Jack helps Eliza up and they drag her out of the bar with Kate's assistance, marking their departure from the scene.

litography_node.name: First Glimpse of The Petrov
litography_node.description: The scene cuts to the crew arriving at their new ship, The Petrov, in its dining area.

litography_node.name: Discovery of the Walled City
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery and Eliza notice a geode-like structure along the walls of their ship, which is revealed to be an enormous cave system.

litography_node.name: Reaction to the Walled City
litography_node.description: The crew members (Kate, Bernie) react with amazement and wonder, using exclamatory phrases ("By the Founders!", "Holy...") to express their awe at the natural phenomenon.

litography_node.name: Communication Breakthrough
litography_node.description: Eliza uses Jack's Communicator to contact him on the bridge, revealing that she has discovered something significant and prompting Jack to hurry over.

litography_node.name: First Impression of the Walled City
litography_node.description: When Jack arrives at the bridge, he is taken aback by the beauty of the geode-like structure and decides to turn on more lights to illuminate it further.

litography_node.name: Exploration of the Walled City
litography_node.description: Eliza turns the ship around to reveal more of the cave system, while Kate looks back to take in the full extent of the discovery.

litography_node.name: Naming the Discovery
litography_node.description: Bernie guesses that the geode-like structure is called Garnet Caves, and Eliza agrees with a dazed expression, still trying to process the magnitude of their discovery.

litography_node.name: Introduction of The Mouth
litography_node.description: The scene opens with The Mouth giving an order to a Soldier, establishing his authority and setting the tone for the story.

litography_node.name: The Soldier's Departure
litography_node.description: The Soldier rushes off to inform the crew about their mission priorities, creating tension and momentum in the story.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Arrival on the Bridge
litography_node.description: Eliza enters the bridge and turns on the kerosene lamps, setting the scene for a quiet moment of introspection.

litography_node.name: Jack's Entrance
litography_node.description: Jack enters the cabin, casting a light on Eliza, which creates an intimate atmosphere and sets up their interaction.

litography_node.name: Eliza and Jack's Sighs
litography_node.description: Eliza and Jack share a sigh, indicating their shared emotions and frustration with their current situation.

litography_node.name: Jack's Offer of Comfort
litography_node.description: Jack offers to close the door and provides emotional support to Eliza, showing his concern for her well-being.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Disclosure
litography_node.description: Eliza confides in Jack about the cave, revealing a deeper emotional struggle that has been building throughout the story.

litography_node.name: Shared Understanding
litography_node.description: Jack and Eliza share a moment of understanding, with Jack acknowledging her struggles and providing a sense of solidarity.

litography_node.name: The Question
litography_node.description: Eliza asks the attendant if it's hard to breach the defenses.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Optimism
litography_node.description: The attendant responds positively about Eliza leading a group, indicating hope for a successful breach.

litography_node.name: First Glimpse of the City
litography_node.description: Eliza and Kate approach the large white wall with the citadel inside, and Kate's jaw drops in awe at the structure's beauty and scale.

litography_node.name: Discovery of the Founders' Secret
litography_node.description: Bernie mentions that some people believe the Founders had powers beyond human understanding, hinting at a mysterious aspect of the city.

litography_node.name: Preparations for Invasion
litography_node.description: Eliza turns on her communicator to call Jack and asks him to bring Dr. Montgomery to the bridge, indicating preparations are underway.

litography_node.name: Doubts and Concerns
litography_node.description: Jack expresses hesitation about coming to the bridge, and Eliza reassures him, suggesting a moment of tension or uncertainty.

litography_node.name: The Bridge
litography_node.description: Jack enters the bridge, marking a shift from preparation to action.

litography_node.name: Suspicion
litography_node.description: Eliza expresses unease about something being "off" as they observe the city, foreshadowing potential danger or complications.

litography_node.name: Introduce Setting
litography_node.description: The scene introduces a strange and eerie environment with multiple turrets, a crashed ship graveyard, and an ominous atmosphere.

litography_node.name: Discover Crashed Ships
litography_node.description: Eliza discovers the clearing and sees the crashed ships with their skeletons, which sparks concern.

litography_node.name: Reaction to Crashed Ships
litography_node.description: Jack's expression changes from calm to alarm when he sees the crashed ships, showing his concern for the situation.

litography_node.name: Plan of Action
litography_node.description: Jack gets climbing gear and Eliza instructs Kate to stay close while they prepare to lower the crew into the jungle.

litography_node.name: Final Preparations
litography_node.description: Eliza helps Kate into a harness, and Jack preps the rope for the descent, showing their preparation for the mission ahead.

litography_node.name: Kate's Confidence
litography_node.description: Kate confidently agrees to participate in the mission, demonstrating her bravery and willingness to take risks.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Wake-Up Call
litography_node.description: Jack shakes Eliza awake, and they have a brief argument about her drinking too much.

litography_node.name: The Job Reveal
litography_node.description: Bernie reveals that he got them a new job with low risk and high reward, but Eliza is unimpressed.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Disappointment
litography_node.description: Eliza scoffs at the job, calling it "boring," and expressing her desire for something more exciting (high-risk, extreme-reward).

litography_node.name: Eliza Stumbles
litography_node.description: Eliza tries to get up but stumbles and falls on her face.

litography_node.name: Jack's Sigh and Intervention
litography_node.description: Jack sighs, gestures to Kate, who helps him pick up Eliza, and they drag her out of the bar.

litography_node.name: Eliza Meets Kate
litography_node.description: Eliza greets Kate with a smile as they leave the bar together.

litography_node.name: The Transition
litography_node.description: A dissolve to the interior of the Petrov, dining area, marking the transition to a new setting and location.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Childhood Escape
litography_node.description: The scene shows a flashback of Eliza as a child, playing and running freely in Asimov City.

litography_node.name: Market Square Chase
litography_node.description: Eliza runs through a market square pursued by Guards, showcasing her agility and quick thinking as she navigates the treacherous terrain.

litography_node.name: Rope Bridge Close Call
litography_node.description: Eliza cuts the rope bridge behind her, causing it to collapse and narrowly allowing her to escape. She smirks at having outsmarted her pursuers.

litography_node.name: Encounter with Braggart's Behemoth
litography_node.description: Eliza runs into a large burly man, who blocks her path. The scene ends with Eliza being left stunned on the ground.

litography_node.name: Meeting the Stately Man
litography_node.description: A military uniformed man intervenes and quips at Eliza, causing her to express frustration ("shit"). This marks a turning point in the encounter.

litography_node.name: Arrival at Braggart's Cave
litography_node.description: The Petrov (likely a different person) approaches an enormous cliff, heading towards a waterfall that leads to Braggart's Cave.

litography_node.name: Doubt
litography_node.description: ATTENDANT is asked by THE MOUTH about breaching defenses, and hesitates to provide a straightforward answer.

litography_node.name: Assumption
litography_node.description: ATTENDANT speculates that most people stumble upon the breach, but acknowledges Eliza's potential to succeed.

litography_node.name: Confidence Boost
litography_node.description: The MOUTH agrees with ATTENDANT's assessment and expresses optimism about Eliza's chances.

litography_node.name: Discovery
litography_node.description: KATE is amazed by the beauty of the Founder City, inspired to ask how it was built.

litography_node.name: Enigma
litography_node.description: BERNIE shares a mysterious rumor that the Founders had powers beyond human understanding, leaving Eliza and Kate intrigued.

litography_node.name: Decision
litography_node.description: ELIZA instructs KATE to sketch what she can see of the city, while also ordering JACK to bring Dr. Montgomery to the bridge for assistance.

litography_node.name: Unease
litography_node.description: ELIZA senses that something is "off" about the city, prompting her to be cautious before approaching it.

litography_node.name: Arrival
litography_node.description: JACK enters the bridge, responding to Eliza's request for his help and Dr. Montgomery's assistance.

litography_node.name: Introducing Archibald's Offer
litography_node.description: Eliza and the crew process what Archibald just said about offering them 14 Million Credits for the codex, with everyone trying to maintain their composure.

litography_node.name: Eliza Weighs Her Decision
litography_node.description: Eliza is faced with a difficult decision about whether or not to accept Archibald's offer, as her crew is also struggling to keep calm amidst the news.

litography_node.name: Archibald Smiles and Gives Orders
litography_node.description: Archibald gives orders to Jimmy to prepare the team for departure, seemingly unaware of the danger lurking behind him.

litography_node.name: The Unexpected Warning
litography_node.description: A man with a ring appears out of the shadows, warning Eliza that they might not make it, adding tension to the scene.

litography_node.name: Archibald's Confidence
litography_node.description: Archibald asserts his confidence in their ability to complete the mission, despite the warnings from the mysterious stranger.

litography_node.name: Jimmy Departs with Supplies
litography_node.description: Jimmy exits the room and leaves Eliza and her crew with supplies for their journey, while the mysterious man remains hidden behind Archibald.

litography_node.name: The Cloaked Figure Approaches
litography_node.description: A cloaked figure emerges from a dark alleyway, setting up the next scene in a potentially ominous tone.

litography_node.name: Cliff Entrance
litography_node.description: The Petrov approaches an enormous cliff covered in vegetation and heads towards a waterfall to reveal Braggart's cave.

litography_node.name: Cave Discovery
litography_node.description: The Petrov goes through the waterfall and reveals Braggart's cavern, showing its size and layout.

litography_node.name: Docking Port
litography_node.description: The Petrov approaches a docking port in Braggart's cave, where several chains are latched onto a ship, and a dock with a rickety wooden surface is present.

litography_node.name: Merchandise Rush
litography_node.description: Several people rush up to the ship to sell their wares to the crew.

litography_node.name: Repair Discussion
litography_node.description: Jack and Bernie discuss repairs to the docking clamp, while Eliza mentions she needs a drink.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Reminder
litography_node.description: Eliza reminds Jack about his need for replacement parts, despite him downplaying it.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Wake-Up
litography_node.description: Jack shakes Eliza awake, and they have a brief conversation about her drinking too much.

litography_node.name: Job News Revelation
litography_node.description: Jack tells Eliza that Bernie got them a new job, but Eliza interrupts him to reveal that she also got a job.

litography_node.name: Reaction to Job News
litography_node.description: Eliza expresses excitement about her own job and dismisses the one Bernie got for Jack.

litography_node.name: Confrontation Over Jobs
litography_node.description: Eliza confronts Jack over his reaction to her interrupting him, leading to a brief argument.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Stumble
litography_node.description: Eliza tries to get up from the table but stumbles and falls on her face.

litography_node.name: Help Arrives
litography_node.description: Jack and Kate come to help Eliza up, showing concern for her well-being.

litography_node.name: Transition to New Scene
litography_node.description: The scene transitions to the interior of the Petrov's dining area, setting the stage for the next part of the story.

litography_node.name: Introduction of Money
litography_node.description: The conversation between ELIZA and Dr. Montgomery about a large sum of money is introduced.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Skepticism
litography_node.description: Eliza expresses her skepticism about the money, and Dr. Montgomery agrees with her concerns.

litography_node.name: Eliza Reflects on Her Decision
litography_node.description: After discussing the money, Eliza goes back to cleaning her guns, showing that she is still thinking about the decision.

litography_node.name: New Map Reveal
litography_node.description: Bernie reveals a new map with a clear overlay on an existing map at the navigational desk.

litography_node.name: Ship Preparation
litography_node.description: Eliza takes control of the ship, sets a course, and prepares for takeoff.

litography_node.name: Kate's Concerns
litography_node.description: Kate expresses her concern about the ship's altitude and motion.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Nonchalance
litography_node.description: Bernie shows no reaction to the ship's movements, highlighting his calm demeanor.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Reassurance
litography_node.description: Eliza reassures Kate that she will get used to the motion of the ship.

litography_node.name: Frustration Boils Over
litography_node.description: Kate's frustration with Bernie and Eliza's argument finally boils over, snapping her out of her worried state.

litography_node.name: Turning Point
litography_node.description: Eliza makes a crucial decision to turn the ship 15 miles to the left, which leads to a change in their surroundings.

litography_node.name: Disorientation
litography_node.description: The group is suddenly plunged into darkness as the ship stops moving and they look around in wonder at their new surroundings.

litography_node.name: Concerned Call
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery's communicator interrupts the silence, alerting Eliza to a mysterious phenomenon that sparks her curiosity.

litography_node.name: Curiosity Revealed
litography_node.description: Eliza's trance is broken as she flips on the communicator and listens in horror-stricken amazement at what Dr. Montgomery is describing.

litography_node.name: Discovery
litography_node.description: The group discovers that their surroundings have changed dramatically, revealing a previously unknown landscape.

litography_node.name: Jack's Concern
litography_node.description: Jack notices that Kate seems concerned about something and asks her what it is.

litography_node.name: Jack's Frustration
litography_node.description: Jack rushes past Kate, wrench still in hand, indicating his frustration or urgency.

litography_node.name: Kate's Advice
litography_node.description: Kate advises Jack to tell Dr. Montgomery the news himself, suggesting a change in plans.

litography_node.name: Suspenseful Silence
litography_node.description: The scene cuts to Kate and Bernie sitting in silence as Dr. Montgomery eats loudly, building anticipation for what will happen next.

litography_node.name: Eliza's News
litography_node.description: Eliza delivers the bad news that Grant was killed and murdered.

litography_node.name: Jack's Outrage
litography_node.description: Jack is shocked and outraged by the news, his expression changing from calm to furious.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Calming Influence
litography_node.description: Bernie puts a hand on Jack's shoulder to calm him down, showing empathy and concern for Jack's well-being.

litography_node.name: Dr. Montgomery's Sarcasm
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery makes a sarcastic comment about the news, further escalating the tension in the scene.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Explanation
litography_node.description: Eliza explains that Grant was killed because someone knows what they're up to, leaving Jack with more questions and concerns.

litography_node.name: Jack's Memories
litography_node.description: Jack thinks back to his last conversation with Grant, trying to remember any details that might be relevant to the murder.

litography_node.name: Jack's Revelation
litography_node.description: Jack reveals what he told Grant about their job, which may hold a clue to who killed him.

litography_node.name: The Tumble
litography_node.description: The ship burns through the sky.

litography_node.name: Transformation into a Statue
litography_node.description: Branson closes his eyes and is transformed into a brass statue in a clockwork mechanism.

litography_node.name: Introduction to the Founders
litography_node.description: Kate (V.O.) introduces the other Founders, each with their unique abilities and characteristics, including Henderson, Crawford, Vandenburg, and Asimov.

litography_node.name: The Figures Unite
litography_node.description: Branson's figure joins the others in a circle, and they turn to face a spot between them, symbolizing their unity and purpose.

litography_node.name: Revelation of Their Knowledge
litography_node.description: A large lightbulb rises out of the contraption, representing their accumulated knowledge and understanding.

litography_node.name: The Query
litography_node.description: Eliza asks Bernie if it's hard to breach the defenses of the Founder City.

litography_node.name: Confirmation and Assumption
litography_node.description: Bernie shares his thoughts on how people usually stumble upon the city, but acknowledges that with Eliza leading, they may have a chance.

litography_node.name: The Founders' City Revealed
litography_node.description: Eliza, Kate, and Bernie observe the Founder City from afar, taking in its grandeur and discussing its construction.

litography_node.name: Initial Excitement
litography_node.description: Kate's jaw drops as she sees the city with binoculars, and they discuss their plan to explore it further.

litography_node.name: Communication
litography_node.description: Eliza contacts Jack through her communicator, requesting his assistance on the bridge.

litography_node.name: Receiving Guidance
litography_node.description: Jack agrees to meet Eliza at the bridge with Dr. Montgomery and responds to her request for help.

litography_node.name: Caution
litography_node.description: Jack expresses skepticism about the mission, but ultimately agrees to come.

litography_node.name: Preparation
litography_node.description: Eliza turns off her communicator, signaling that the meeting is on the way.

litography_node.name: The Tumble
litography_node.description: The ship experiences a dramatic tumble, with Branson closing his eyes as it hurtles through the sky.

litography_node.name: Transformation
litography_node.description: Branson opens his eyes and transforms into a brass statue in a large clockwork mechanism, striking a heroic pose.

litography_node.name: Exposition Begins
litography_node.description: A CGI explainer appears, setting up the world and introducing the characters that will become Branson's companions.

litography_node.name: Meeting the Companions
litography_node.description: Kate (V.O.) introduces Branson's companions, each with their unique skills and personalities: Henderson, Crawford, Vandenburg, and Asimov.

litography_node.name: The Figures Unite
litography_node.description: Branson's figure joins with his companions to form a circle, preparing for something significant.

litography_node.name: Revelation
litography_node.description: A large lightbulb rises from the center of the figures, symbolizing the discovery of their knowledge and redemption.

litography_node.name: Initial Reaction
litography_node.description: The crew processes Archibald's revelation of the 14 Million Credits offer and Kate's reaction is evident as everyone tries to ignore it.

litography_node.name: Eliza Weighs Options
litography_node.description: Eliza considers the offer, weighing the pros and cons, as she tries to decide whether to take it or not.

litography_node.name: Archibald Smiles
litography_node.description: Archibald smiles wide after receiving a positive response from Eliza, indicating his excitement and anticipation for the codex.

litography_node.name: The Betrayal
litography_node.description: A man moves out of the shadows behind Archibald, revealing he is not who he seems to be, adding an element of tension to the scene.

litography_node.name: Man's Doubts
litography_node.description: The mysterious man expresses doubts about the crew's chances of survival, hinting at a larger threat.

litography_node.name: Cloaked Approach
litography_node.description: A cloaked figure approaches in a dark alleyway, setting up an ominous and foreboding atmosphere for what's to come.

litography_node.name: Initial Chaos
litography_node.description: Both ships begin to drop, causing people to fly everywhere inside the temple ship.

litography_node.name: Priest's Confusion
litography_node.description: A priest is shown clinging onto the navigation desk, expressing confusion and disorientation as the ship drops.

litography_node.name: Eliza Takes Action
litography_node.description: Eliza slaps the emergency release to close the clampted-out temple people, then slams the throttle to full on and raises the air to normal.

litography_node.name: Ship Split and Launch
litography_node.description: The two ships suddenly shoot apart, with one temple ship going up and the other falling down. The Petrov's turbines blast to full on and it rockets forward.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Reaction
litography_node.description: Eliza shuts off her comms device and looks at her disarrayed crewmates with an enormous grin plastered on her face, indicating her satisfaction and control over the situation.

litography_node.name: Flashback to Childhood
litography_node.description: Eliza's expression turns from one of triumph to nostalgia as she recalls a similar moment from her childhood in An Asimov City.

actor.actor_role: Navigator and likely a crew member of The Petrov

faction.name: The Asimov Clan

faction.goals: To maintain or spread their beliefs and values, possibly at the expense of others.
faction.faction_values: Secrecy, potentially conflicting with the values of the Founders.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not explicitly stated, but implied to have resources for secretive activities and potential conflicts.
faction.faction_expenses: Not detailed in the text.

faction.goals: To uphold the values and rules set by the Founders and to protect their own clan from heresy.
faction.faction_values: Loyalty, justice, and adherence to the teachings of the Founders.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not explicitly stated, but implied to have resources for military actions.
faction.faction_expenses: Military operations against other clans.

faction.name: The Petrov

faction.goals: To explore and gather knowledge or resources from the ruins.
faction.faction_values: Exploration, discovery, and presumably a sense of duty to uncover the history or purpose of the structures.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not explicitly stated but could be funded by a higher authority or organization with interests in historical findings.
faction.faction_expenses: Fuel, supplies, personnel wages.

faction.faction_values: Wisdom, light, and the sanctity of all life.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not explicitly stated but implied through their influence over society.
faction.faction_expenses: Maintenance and upkeep of structures, possibly also in providing guidance and knowledge.

faction.description: An individual who appears to be involved in a clandestine operation or project with Archibald.
faction.goals: To ensure the success of the project and maintain secrecy about its nature.
faction.faction_values: Ambition, pragmatism, and possibly loyalty to an undisclosed higher authority.
faction.faction_income_sources: Not explicitly stated but implied through his authority over resources and personnel.
faction.faction_expenses: Resources for the project, possibly including bribery or blackmail.

faction.description: A group or individual with significant financial power, seeking a valuable artifact (the Codex).
faction.goals: To acquire the Codex for an unknown purpose, likely involving financial gain or historical significance.

faction.faction_income_sources: Financial wealth, possibly through trade, investments, or other lucrative ventures.
faction.faction_expenses: Not detailed in the text but implied to involve significant resources.
