faction.description: A marketplace within a cavern where goods are traded.
faction.goals: To facilitate commerce and economic activities among various groups.
faction.faction_values: Trade and profit.
faction.faction_income_sources: Profits from the sale of goods and services.
faction.faction_expenses: Operational costs, possibly including tax or fees levied by higher authorities.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Pickup
litography_node.description: Kate helps pick up and drag Eliza out of the bar.

litography_node.name: Greeting at the Bar
litography_node.description: Eliza greets Kate upon being picked up, showing a casual demeanor despite recent events.

litography_node.name: Transition to Dining Area
litography_node.description: The scene dissolves to the next day in the Petrov dining area, setting the stage for further events and introducing the setting.

litography_node.name: Setting Description
litography_node.description: The dining area is described as small, cramped with Victorian architecture and copper accents, providing details about the environment.

litography_node.name: Crew Gathering
litography_node.description: The whole crew sits down at a table in the dining area, including Eliza who has an ice pack on her head and a cup of tea beside her.

litography_node.name: Dr. Montgomery's Questioning
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery questions Eliza about her job offer, indicating tension or frustration due to waiting all night.

litography_node.name: Jack's Interruption
litography_node.description: Jack interrupts Dr. Montgomery, bringing the focus back to Bernie's job discussion, showing his eagerness to hear details.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Evasion
litography_node.description: Eliza tries to change the topic by suggesting they first hear about Bernie's job offer, revealing her anxiety or memory lapse.

litography_node.name: Kate's Retort
litography_node.description: Kate reminds Eliza that she insisted on discussing her job first, highlighting their dynamic and the underlying conflict between them.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Confusion
litography_node.description: Eliza expresses confusion about what the previous job was, indicating a memory issue or deception.

litography_node.name: Loud Knocking
litography_node.description: A loud knocking sound comes from the cargo bay, causing everyone to freeze and look around, signaling potential tension or an impending event.

litography_node.name: Eliza Falls Asleep at the Table
litography_node.description: Eliza is found sleeping on a table after drinking too much.

litography_node.name: Jack Attempts to Wake Eliza
litography_node.description: Jack approaches Eliza and tries to wake her up, reminding her of their agreement about alcohol consumption.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Disobedience
litography_node.description: Eliza mumbles incoherently when asked if she remembered the rule about drinking too much.

litography_node.name: Jack Carries Eliza Out
litography_node.description: Jack sighs and picks up Eliza, preparing to take her with them as they head for their new job assignment.

litography_node.name: Disagreement Over Job Information
litography_node.description: Jack is surprised when Eliza claims she also found a job opportunity, leading to an exchange where Jack acknowledges Eliza’s contribution but dismisses its value.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Excitement About Her Job Lead
litography_node.description: Eliza expresses enthusiasm for her own job lead, describing it as high-risk with extreme rewards in contrast to Bernie's low-risk, high-reward offer.

litography_node.name: Group Headed to the Ship
litography_node.description: Jack decides they should board the ship to hear more about both job opportunities and leads the group there.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Misstep Upon Waking Up
litography_node.description: Eliza attempts to get up but stumbles, falling on her face, adding to the humorous tone of the scene.

litography_node.name: Crew Leaves the Bar
litography_node.description: Jack uses hand gestures and help from Kate to drag an unsteady Eliza out of the bar towards the ship.

litography_node.name: Transition to Ship Scene
litography_node.description: The scene transitions to inside the ship's dining area, setting up the next part of their discussion or action.

litography_node.name: Montgomery's Surprise
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery expresses excitement over something the others are observing, suggesting it is a beautiful sight.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Inquiry
litography_node.description: Eliza asks what Dr. Montgomery is seeing, indicating she is unaware of the current view and seeking clarification.

litography_node.name: Revealing the View
litography_node.description: Eliza raises the ship to reveal walls that are like those of a geode, covered in red garnets, surprising everyone on board.

litography_node.name: Kate's Amazement
litography_node.description: Kate exclaims with awe at the sight of the walls, emphasizing their beauty and significance.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Surprise
litography_node.description: Eliza expresses amazement verbally ("Holy... "), showing her initial reaction to the discovery.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Praise
litography_node.description: Bernie compliments the view, agreeing with the others that it is beautiful and likely a significant site.

litography_node.name: Jack's Communicator Activation
litography_node.description: Eliza fumbles to turn on Jack's communicator, indicating urgency or excitement about sharing this discovery.

litography_node.name: Jack's Arrival
litography_node.description: Footsteps are heard as Jack approaches the bridge, showing his physical presence and involvement in the scene.

litography_node.name: Jack's Explanation
litography_node.description: Jack explains that he fixed some lights to enhance the view, providing context for their enhanced visibility.

litography_node.name: Observing the Geode
litography_node.description: Eliza turns the ship around to observe more of the geode and its vast interior filled with garnets, further detailing the discovery.

litography_node.name: Naming the Location
litography_node.description: Bernie suggests calling it Garnet Caves, giving a name to this newfound location and potentially setting expectations for future actions.

litography_node.name: Soldier's Obedience
litography_node.description: The Soldier carries out an order from THE MOUTH to inform the crew about prioritizing their current mission over honoring fallen comrades.

litography_node.name: Mouth's Reflection
litography_node.description: THE MOUTH contemplates a mysterious fire coming from his ship’s eye, suggesting some internal conflict or unexplained phenomena.

litography_node.name: Ship's Interior - Introduction
litography_node.description: INT. THE PETROV, BRIDGE - NIGHT sets the scene and establishes the time of night on the bridge.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Arrival
litography_node.description: Eliza enters the ship’s bridge and turns on kerosene lamps, creating a low light atmosphere, introducing her presence.

litography_node.name: Jack's Entry
litography_node.description: Jack enters from the doorway, casting light onto Eliza, setting up their interaction in dim lighting conditions.

litography_node.name: Initial Encounter
litography_node.description: Eliza reacts to seeing Jack, indicating a familiar or significant relationship between them through mutual sighing and looking at the floor.

litography_node.name: Sleepless Night
litography_node.description: JACK asks if ELIZA can't sleep, introducing the theme of insomnia affecting both characters.

litography_node.name: Cave Mention
litography_node.description: ELIZA acknowledges that the cave is the source of her unease, suggesting a shared or linked experience related to a cave or similar location.

litography_node.name: Introduction of the Attendant and The Mouth's Discussion
litography_node.description: The Mouth asks an attendant about breaching defenses, to which the attendant responds by saying most people stumble upon them. The Mouth acknowledges this point but expresses hope that Eliza might offer a chance at success.

litography_node.name: Exterior of Founder City
litography_node.description: The Petrov approaches a large white wall enclosing a citadel inside, hidden in the jungle. The walls are described as smooth and pristine, curving like a large flower.

litography_node.name: Discovery by Kate
litography_node.description: Eliza hands binoculars to Kate, who is amazed at what she can see through them. Kate questions how the Founders could have built such a structure.

litography_node.name: Speculation on Founder Abilities
litography_node.description: Bernie suggests that some believe the Founders had powers beyond human understanding.

litography_node.name: Analysis of the Scene
litography_node.description: Eliza surveys and analyzes the city, noticing something seems "off."

litography_node.name: Call to Jack for Assistance
litography_node.description: Eliza uses a communicator to call Jack and asks him to come to the bridge for help. She also requests that Dr. Montgomery join them.

litography_node.name: Jack's Confirmation
litography_node.description: Jack confirms he will be there, albeit with some hesitation as indicated by his questioning tone before agreeing.

litography_node.name: Jack's Concern
litography_node.description: Jack's smile falters when Kate suggests Eliza tell him the news herself.

litography_node.name: Jack's Rush to Find Out
litography_node.description: Jack rushes past Kate with a wrench in hand, eager to find out what happened.

litography_node.name: The Dining Area Setting
litography_node.description: The scene is set in the Petrov dining area, where Kate and Bernie are seated in silence while Dr. Montgomery loudly snacks on chips/crackers.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Announcement of Bad News
litography_node.description: Eliza enters followed by Jack, and announces that Grant was killed today.

litography_node.name: Jack's Outburst
litography_node.description: Jack reacts angrily to the news, expressing his shock and disbelief that Grant was murdered.

litography_node.name: Dr. Montgomery's Sarcastic Response
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery sarcastically comments, implying that someone dying is a common occurrence.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Question
litography_node.description: Bernie questions who could have committed such an act of violence against Grant.

litography_node.name: Eliza Reveals the Nature of Grant's Death
litography_node.description: Eliza confirms that Grant was burned alive, providing more details about the nature of his death.

litography_node.name: Jack's Guilt and Reflection
litography_node.description: Jack sits back down, balls his fists, and reflects on his last conversation with Grant, realizing he might have been the last person to see him alive.

litography_node.name: Dr. Montgomery Observes the Forest
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery notices that there are too many clearings in the forest, which prompts Eliza to investigate.

litography_node.name: Eliza Discovers Crashed Ships
litography_node.description: Upon closer inspection, Eliza realizes that one of the clearings is more sinister than it appears; several ships have crashed and burned, their remnants rusting.

litography_node.name: Dr. Montgomery Receives Binoculars
litography_node.description: Jack gives Dr. Montgomery a pair of binoculars to examine the situation more closely, noting the poor condition of what they are observing.

litography_node.name: Eliza Discovers Turret Direction
litography_node.description: Bernie points out that most turrets seem aimed at the sky, which intrigues and concerns Eliza.

litography_node.name: Jack Receives Orders
litography_node.description: Jack is tasked by Eliza to retrieve climbing gear for an expedition into the jungle.

litography_node.name: Expedition Preparation
litography_node.description: The crew prepares for a descent onto the jungle floor; Eliza helps Kate into a harness, and Jack sets up ropes for lowering the team.

litography_node.name: Eliza Encourages Team Member
litography_node.description: Eliza reassures Kate about her decision to join the expedition, emphasizing the importance of staying close during their mission.

litography_node.name: Initiate Journey
litography_node.description: Eliza starts the ship to follow the coordinates given by Bernie.

litography_node.name: Preparation for Long Voyage
litography_node.description: Bernie informs the crew they will be on course for several hours, suggesting everyone get comfortable. The Petrov sets sail.

litography_node.name: Landscapes and Atmosphere
litography_node.description: Crossfade to the bridge of the Petrov a few hours later, where Eliza looks out at the fog-covered cliffs with Kate.

litography_node.name: Observation of Nature
litography_node.description: Eliza comments on the beauty of the scenery, prompting Kate to express her unfamiliarity with the jungle cliffs of Burnia and her curiosity about the Jackals.

litography_node.name: Character Background
litography_node.description: Eliza reveals that Kate grew up in a mountain land, giving context to their different experiences.

litography_node.name: Inquisitive Nature of Kate
litography_node.description: Kate expresses interest in Jackals and begins to closely examine the trees for them.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Knowledge
litography_node.description: Bernie confirms the existence of Jackals and shares knowledge that challenges common beliefs about their nature, being gentle creatures.

litography_node.name: Navigation Update
litography_node.description: Bernie announces they are approaching a turning point in their journey.

litography_node.name: Ship Collision and Explosion
litography_node.description: One of the small ships runs into a pipe and explodes, lighting up the cave briefly.

litography_node.name: Alien Ruins Discovery
litography_node.description: Kate questions if they are in a founder ruin, observing many metallic alien structures including a large dome. Other buildings spread around this structure.

litography_node.name: Firing Engaged
litography_node.description: A small ship catches up to the Petrov and begins to fire; Dr. Montgomery starts using the autocannon to return fire.

litography_node.name: Exploring New Corridor
litography_node.description: The ships approach a new corridor filled with web-like bridges stretching across the cave.

litography_node.name: Ship Explosions
litography_node.description: Some small ships explode on structures, causing parts of the cave to light up again.

litography_node.name: City Center Revealed
litography_node.description: The explosions reveal what must have been a busy city center at some point; the structures are described as alien in nature.

litography_node.name: Kate's Sketching
litography_node.description: Kate starts sketching furiously, noting how her metallic desk pairs well with magnets in her books. She has a sketchbook and a worn copy of the codex.

litography_node.name: Final Ship Struggle
litography_node.description: The last ship struggles to make it through the web of structures but manages to do so, leaving some dents behind.

litography_node.name: Cave Continues
litography_node.description: The narrative ends with mention that the cave continues.

litography_node.name: Eliza Drunkenly Awaits Crew's Arrival
litography_node.description: Eliza is sleeping on a table, indicating she has been drinking heavily. The crew approaches her.

litography_node.name: Jack Wakes Up Eliza
litography_node.description: Jack attempts to wake up Eliza and reprimands her for drinking too much. Eliza is confused about his concerns.

litography_node.name: Eliza Denies Drinking
litography_node.description: Eliza tries to remember what Jack said, revealing she was likely intoxicated at the time of their conversation.

litography_node.name: Jack Arouses Crew's Interest in New Job
litography_node.description: Jack informs Eliza that Bernie got them a new job. Eliza initially dismisses it, but then claims to have gotten a better one herself.

litography_node.name: Bernie Presents His Job Offer
litography_node.description: Bernie introduces the job as low risk and high reward, which catches Eliza's interest with her own proposal of a high-risk, extreme-reward opportunity.

litography_node.name: Jack Acknowledges Eliza's Contribution
litography_node.description: Jack acknowledges that Eliza also got them a job but is clearly taken aback by the different nature of it.

litography_node.name: Eliza Discovers Her Own Job Opportunity
litography_node.description: Eliza reveals her own job proposal, which is more exciting than Bernie's offer, leading to an internal conflict among the crew members.

litography_node.name: Eliza Falls Down in Humiliation
litography_node.description: Eliza attempts to get up but stumbles and falls on her face, embarrassing herself further after trying to assert dominance over the situation.

litography_node.name: Crew Exits Bar Together
litography_node.description: Jack sighs, gestures for Kate's help, and they collectively drag Eliza out of the bar, ending their night with a mix of embarrassment and camaraderie.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Childhood Grin
litography_node.description: Eliza grins with glee as a child and looks over her shoulder with concern before doubling her pace.

litography_node.name: Eliza Fleeing Through Market Square
litography_node.description: Eliza runs through a market square, holding a satchel close to her chest. Three guards follow her, cursing after her. The town is set on large cliffs with rusted and barely held together buildings. She eventually runs across a rope bridge to another butte and cuts it, causing the guards to narrowly escape the collapsing bridge. She smirks.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Smirk
litography_node.description: After cutting the rope, Eliza smirks as she turns around to run.

litography_node.name: Eliza Collides with a Man
litography_node.description: Eliza runs into a large burly man and spills to the ground. A stateley man in a military uniform walks up from the sidelines and quips.

litography_node.name: Guard's Quip
litography_node.description: The stateley man asks, "And just where do you think you are going?" This causes Eliza to react with surprise or discomfort.

litography_node.name: Approach of Braggart's Cave
litography_node.description: A Petrov approaches an enormous cliff covered in vegetation and heads towards a waterfall. Entering the waterfall reveals Braggart's cave, setting up the next scene.

litography_node.name: Initial Discussion on Breaching Defenses
litography_node.description: The Attendant and THE MOUTH discuss the difficulty of breaching defenses, with the latter believing Eliza might offer a chance due to her leadership.

litography_node.name: Exterior Scene at The Founder City
litography_node.description: The Petrov approaches an impressive white wall surrounding a citadel. The walls are smooth, pristine, and curve like a large flower, hidden within a jungle setting. Eliza compliments Kate on noticing the city, and they discuss the Founders' construction.

litography_node.name: Inquisitive Observation of the City
litography_node.description: Kate marvels at how the Founders could have built such an extensive structure, leading to a brief exchange about potential unknown powers attributed to the Founders.

litography_node.name: Call for Jack's and Dr. Montgomery's Assistance
litography_node.description: Eliza calls Jack through her communicator, asking him and Dr. Montgomery to come to the bridge where she needs their help.

litography_node.name: Concern Over Bringing Dr. Montgomery
litography_node.description: Jack hesitantly agrees to bring Dr. Montgomery after some back-and-forth with Eliza about the necessity of his presence.

litography_node.name: Preparatory Action Before Inspection
litography_node.description: Eliza turns off her communicator, and Kate begins sketching details of the city from a distance because she cannot see clearly enough. Eliza expresses concern that something seems amiss before Jack enters the bridge area.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Decision
litography_node.description: Eliza considers Archibald’s offer and ultimately agrees to retrieve the codex for him.

litography_node.name: Archibald's Assurance
litography_node.description: Archibald confirms his offer of fourteen million credits if the crew brings him the codex, followed by a wide smile upon receiving their agreement.

litography_node.name: Crew's Departure
litography_node.description: Jimmy provides the necessary map and supplies to Eliza and the others before they leave, indicating their mission has begun.

litography_node.name: Man in Shadows Questions Archibald
litography_node.description: The man in shadows inquires about the crew’s survival prospects with a Ring, showing he is aware of or invested in their success or failure.

litography_node.name: Archibald's Confidence
litography_node.description: Archibald expresses confidence that the crew will succeed despite previous losses, emphasizing the importance of this project to him.

litography_node.name: Setting the Scene for Next Action
litography_node.description: The scene transitions to a dark alleyway at night, setting up an impending confrontation or event involving a cloaked man with beady eyes.

litography_node.name: Initial Fight
litography_node.description: Scrawny Man is cracked in the jaw by an unseen force, causing him to look bewildered and then jump to his feet.

litography_node.name: Kate Enters Temple
litography_node.description: Kate enters a medium-sized chapel made of wood. It appears empty except for four large statues at the front that watch over pulpits, with a fifth broken base suggesting an Asimov statue was once there.

litography_node.name: Kate's Seat and Codex
litography_node.description: Kate takes a seat at the back of the chapel and pulls out a large copy of the Codex. She opens it to the front page where she finds a note from her long-lost parents, which causes her eyes to water.

litography_node.name: Mother's Note (Part 1)
litography_node.description: Kate's mother's voice narrates a message in the codex, stating that the Codex is their last gift and encouraging Kate when feeling weak.

litography_node.name: Mother's Note (Part 2)
litography_node.description: Kate's mother continues her note, assuring Kate that they are happy and the Founders will be with her.

litography_node.name: Mother's Note (Part 3)
litography_node.description: Kate finds her resolve after reading her mother’s message.

litography_node.name: Priest's Arrival
litography_node.description: A priest in fine clothes enters through a door at the front of the chapel and approaches a confessional-like structure.

litography_node.name: Approaching Braggart's Cave
litography_node.description: The Petrov approaches an enormous cliff covered in vegetation and a waterfall to reveal Braggart's cave. The cave is large enough to house several airships with buildings perched precariously on the walls or carved into the cliff face, containing multiple ships connected by chains.

litography_node.name: Inside Braggart's Cave
litography_node.description: The setting inside the cave is described as spacious and industrial, with a mix of natural elements (cavern) and man-made structures (airships, buildings).

litography_node.name: Workers Repairing Ships
litography_node.description: Several workers are seen working on repairing ships that are chained to the roof of the cavern.

litography_node.name: Jack's Interaction at Docking Port
litography_node.description: Jack arrives at a docking port and begins interacting with others. He asks Bernie to take care of merchandise while he goes to get replacement parts for a broken clamp, and Eliza expresses her intention to go get a drink, reminding Jack not to overindulge.

litography_node.name: Jack's Request for Parts
litography_node.description: Jack requests specific items (replacement parts) from Bernie at the docking port.

litography_node.name: Eliza Drunk at the Table
litography_node.description: Eliza is found sleeping on a table after drinking too much.

litography_node.name: Jack Waking Up Eliza
litography_node.description: Jack approaches and wakes up Eliza, reminding her of their earlier agreement about alcohol consumption.

litography_node.name: Disagreement Over New Job
litography_node.description: Jack informs Eliza that Bernie got them a new job. Eliza responds by claiming she also secured a job for the crew, leading to surprise and argument between them.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Excitement
litography_node.description: Upon hearing of his potential job, Bernie becomes enthusiastic about it being a low risk, high reward opportunity.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Counter Proposal
litography_node.description: Eliza disagrees with Bernie’s proposal and suggests an alternative that is high risk but offers extreme rewards.

litography_node.name: Jack's Decision to Proceed
litography_node.description: Jack decides to go along with the plan, suggesting they discuss it on the ship.

litography_node.name: Eliza Falls Down
litography_node.description: Despite being ready to join them, Eliza stumbles and falls on her face upon standing up, causing Jack to sigh and have Kate assist in dragging her away from the bar.

litography_node.name: Departure From the Bar
litography_node.description: Jack and Kate help Eliza leave the bar, heading towards their ship.

litography_node.name: Concern about Money
litography_node.description: Eliza questions Dr. Montgomery about the unexpected money, to which Dr. Montgomery expresses skepticism.

litography_node.name: Decision to Proceed
litography_node.description: Despite the doubts, Eliza decides that they have no other choice but to act on the situation.

litography_node.name: Preparing for Departure
litography_node.description: Eliza returns to cleaning her guns and later looks at a map thoughtfully before preparing to leave.

litography_node.name: New Day, New Setting
litography_node.description: The scene transitions to the next day with a description of the sunlit bridge setting.

litography_node.name: Characters in Place
litography_node.description: Introduces the characters—Eliza, Bernie, and Kate—in their respective uniforms and attire for the new location and purpose.

litography_node.name: Setting Course
litography_node.description: Eliza instructs Bernie on the heading to take and adjusts the ship's settings to prepare for departure.

litography_node.name: Emotional Response
litography_node.description: Kate expresses her nervousness about the upcoming journey, to which Eliza tries to reassure her.

litography_node.name: Argument Breakdown
litography_node.description: Kate reacts to the argument between Bernie and Eliza by interrupting them and expressing her concern for their behavior.

litography_node.name: Silence After Interruption
litography_node.description: The group falls silent after Kate's interruption, indicating a temporary resolution of conflict but also setting up an awkward atmosphere.

litography_node.name: Navigation Continuation
litography_node.description: Eliza continues the navigation while Bernie records the information, establishing their roles and actions in the situation.

litography_node.name: Mileage Check
litography_node.description: Bernie notes that they have traveled 15 miles without any changes in their surroundings, indicating a lack of progress or movement forward.

litography_node.name: Light Disappearance
litography_node.description: The ship's lights suddenly stop casting on the surrounding area, signaling a significant change in the environment and potentially heightening tension or curiosity.

litography_node.name: Ship Stopping
litography_node.description: Eliza stops the ship abruptly, reacting to the disappearance of light, which could signify a decision made based on new information or perceived danger.

litography_node.name: Location Uncertainty
litography_node.description: Kate expresses confusion about their location after stopping the ship, indicating anxiety and the need for clarification in the group's current situation.

litography_node.name: Device Activation
litography_node.description: Eliza activates Dr. Montgomery's communicator, suggesting they seek external information or assistance to understand what is happening.

litography_node.name: Remote Communication
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery communicates through the communicator, providing mysterious and potentially beautiful imagery that disrupts the group's current state of confusion.

litography_node.name: Jack's Distrust
litography_node.description: Jack's smile falter and he rushes past Kate with a wrench after being told Eliza should tell him something important herself.

litography_node.name: The Gathering
litography_node.description: Kate and Bernie sit in silence at the table, while Dr. Montgomery loudly munches on chips/crackers. This sets the scene for upcoming events.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Announcement
litography_node.description: Eliza enters with Jack and announces "I have bad news," setting off a tense atmosphere.

litography_node.name: Dr. Montgomery's Sarcastic Response
litography_node.description: Dr. Montgomery sarcastically comments, escalating the tension between characters.

litography_node.name: Jack's Anger
litography_node.description: Jack balls his fists and gets up in response to Dr. Montgomery's comment, indicating his emotional state.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Intervention
litography_node.description: Bernie tries to calm Jack down by putting a hand on his shoulder and shaking his head.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Confirmation
litography_node.description: Eliza confirms that Grant was murdered, adding gravity to the situation.

litography_node.name: Jack's Outburst
litography_node.description: Jack exclaims that Grant was burned alive, showing his shock and disbelief.

litography_node.name: Bernie's Questioning
litography_node.description: Bernie asks who might have done such a thing, indicating their need for answers.

litography_node.name: Eliza's Suspicions
litography_node.description: Eliza reveals that the killer likely knows what they are up to and suggests Jack was last with Grant, leading to further suspicion.

litography_node.name: Ship Landing
litography_node.description: The ship tumbles and fires retrograde to initiate landing, burning through the sky.

litography_node.name: Branson's Moment of Realization
litography_node.description: Branson closes his eyes as if in acceptance or contemplation during the ship's descent.

litography_node.name: Transition to CGI Explanation
litography_node.description: A match cut transitions to an internal CGI explainer, setting up a visual narrative.

litography_node.name: Introduction of Founders
litography_node.description: Kate (V.O.) explains that the Founders fell from the heavens long ago and introduces the following characters:

litography_node.name: Formation of Circle
litography_node.description: The figures representing the characters join together in a circle, standing in unison.

litography_node.name: Leadership and Redemption
litography_node.description: Kate (V.O.) narrates that Branson is the leader and that they found redemption and became holy as one unit.

litography_node.name: Rise of Lightbulb
litography_node.description: A large lightbulb emerges from the mechanism in the middle of their formation, symbolizing knowledge or enlightenment.

litography_node.name: Montgomery's Decision
litography_node.description: Montgomery pauses for a moment before firing on the enemy ship's engines.

litography_node.name: Ship's Destruction
litography_node.description: The ship careens out of control and crashes into the center "post" of the geode, causing it to erupt into a fireball and shatter.

litography_node.name: Ceiling Collapse
litography_node.description: Large chunks of the ceiling begin to fall, prompting concern among the crew.

litography_node.name: Panic and Search for Exit
litography_node.description: The crew frantically searches the ceiling for an exit while Eliza tries to dodge falling debris.

litography_node.name: Discovery of Exit
litography_node.description: Kate spots an opening in the ceiling as pieces continue to fall, signaling a potential escape route.

litography_node.name: Escape Attempt
litography_node.description: Eliza rushes towards the discovered exit with the crew following closely while dodging more falling debris.

litography_node.name: Catastrophic Collapse
litography_node.description: The entire cave collapses, shattering all the gems and causing a dramatic end to their pursuit of riches.

litography_node.name: Acceptance of Loss
litography_node.description: Eliza expresses disappointment about losing the opportunity for riches, with Kate reflecting on the beauty of what they had seen.

litography_node.name: Crew Regroups
litography_node.description: The crew takes a moment to catch their breath after the collapse.

litography_node.name: Future Planning
litography_node.description: Bernie suggests heading south-east based on a compass and map, but acknowledges uncertainty about the direction from which this instruction is given.

litography_node.name: Attendant's Uncertainty About Breaching Defenses
litography_node.description: The attendant expresses uncertainty about how to breach the defenses, stating that most people stumble upon them by accident.

litography_node.name: The Mouth’s Confidence with Eliza Leading
litography_node.description: The Mouth shows confidence in Eliza’s ability to find a way through the defenses despite the attendant's skepticism.

litography_node.name: Exterior of Founder City - Approaching Walls
litography_node.description: The Petrov approaches the large white walls surrounding the Founder City, setting the scene and introducing the city's architecture and location within a jungle.

litography_node.name: Kate’s Awe at Founders’ Architecture
litography_node.description: Kate expresses amazement at how the Founders were able to build such an impressive structure.

litography_node.name: Bernie’s Speculation on Founders’ Abilities
litography_node.description: Bernie speculates that the Founders may have had abilities beyond human understanding, suggesting a mysterious and advanced nature of their civilization.

litography_node.name: Eliza Surveys the City
litography_node.description: Eliza inspects the city from a distance, carefully analyzing its structure while passing binoculars to Kate for a closer view.

litography_node.name: Kate’s Request for Closer Inspection
litography_node.description: Kate suggests moving closer so she can see more details of the Founders' architecture better.

litography_node.name: Eliza’s Concern About Potential Danger
litography_node.description: Eliza notes something seems "off" about the city, indicating a potential danger or hidden issue that needs to be addressed.

litography_node.name: Eliza Requests Help from Jack and Dr. Montgomery
litography_node.description: Eliza uses her communicator to ask Jack to come to the bridge for assistance and adds that Dr. Montgomery should also join them.

litography_node.name: Jack’s Surprise and Affirmation
litography_node.description: Jack, who seems taken aback by Eliza's request, confirms his presence but questions it again before agreeing to go with Dr. Montgomery.

litography_node.name: Space Landing Initiation
litography_node.description: Branson initiates the ship's landing by intermittently firing retrograde thrusters as it burns through the sky.

litography_node.name: Branson's Closing Eyes
litography_node.description: Branson closes his eyes during the intense space landing, indicating a moment of vulnerability or focus.

litography_node.name: Match Cut to CGI Expanatory Scene
litography_node.description: A transition occurs to an animated scene explaining the background, showing a large clockwork mechanism with various characters in brass statues.

litography_node.name: Branson as Brass Statue
litography_node.description: Branson transforms into a brass statue in a heroic pose pointing the way within the clockwork mechanism.

litography_node.name: Kate's Voiceover Introduction of Founders
litography_node.description: Kate, through voiceover, introduces the concept that long ago, the Founders fell from the heavens and describes them as the protectors (Henderson), cultivators (Crawford), builders (Vandenburg), and philosophers (Asimov).

litography_node.name: Group Formation
litography_node.description: Branson's figure joins other brass statues in forming a circle within the clockwork mechanism.

litography_node.name: Figures Facing a Spot
litography_node.description: The group of figures turns to face a specific spot between them, implying an intention or purpose.

litography_node.name: Lightbulb Rising
litography_node.description: A large lightbulb rises from the contraption in the middle of the figures, symbolizing enlightenment or knowledge coming to the group.

litography_node.name: Founding Knowledge
litography_node.description: Kate's voiceover concludes with a statement about their collective knowledge, suggesting that through unity and shared wisdom, they found redemption and became holy.

litography_node.name: Crew's Reaction to Archibald's Offer
litography_node.description: The crew tries not to react to Archibald's offer of 14 million credits for the codex, but Kate fails miserably.

litography_node.name: Eliza Agrees to Take on the Mission
litography_node.description: Eliza agrees to take on the mission to bring back the codex and receive the offered 14 million credits.

litography_node.name: Archibald's Positive Response
litography_node.description: Archibald smiles widely in response to Eliza's agreement, indicating he is pleased with their decision.

litography_node.name: Archieball's Instruction to Jimmy
litography_node.description: Archibald instructs Jimmy to provide the crew with a map and supplies needed for their mission.

litography_node.name: Jimmy's Guidance of the Crew
litography_node.description: Jimmy leads the way as he gestures for the crew to follow him, initiating their departure from the temple area.

litography_node.name: The Man in Shadows' Concern
litography_node.description: A man moves out of the shadows and poses a question about the crew's survival chances, indicating some underlying tension or concern regarding the mission.

litography_node.name: Archibald's Justification for Success
litography_node.description: Archibald justifies the necessity of their success by mentioning the lost time and money on the project that could change history.

litography_node.name: Cut to Dark Alleyway at Night
litography_node.description: The scene transitions to a dark allyway at night, setting up an ominous atmosphere and potentially introducing new elements to the story.

litography_node.name: Ship Disengagement
litography_node.description: Both ships begin to drop; inside the temple ship, a priest clings to the navigation desk, exclaiming confusion. Inside the Petrov, everyone clings on for dear life as Eliza commands the release of the clamp and engages emergency systems.

litography_node.name: Ships Separate
litography_node.description: The two ships suddenly shoot apart. The temple ship goes up while the Petrov falls down. The Petrov's turbines activate fully, propelling it forward. Eliza corrects the ship's orientation to level again.

litography_node.name: Jack's Criticism
litography_node.description: Jack objects to Eliza's actions over the comms, expressing anger and concern about potential damage. Eliza ignores him, showing confidence in her decision-making.

litography_node.name: Childhood Memory
litography_node.description: A match cut transitions to a young Eliza smiling with joy, hinting at her background and emotional state before the current situation. Her gaze suggests she is recalling fond memories as the present action unfolds.
